data.title: Request for Proposal (RFP): Vending Machine Concession Lynden Pindling International Airport
data.meta_description: Nassau Airport Development Company (NAD), the operator of the Lynden Pindling International Airport (LPIA) is interested in attracting experienced, enthusiastic and imaginative operators for a Vending Machine Concession Program. data.text:
Nassau Airport Development Company (NAD), the operator of the Lynden Pindling International Airport (LPIA) is interested in attracting experienced, enthusiastic and imaginative operators for a Vending Machine Concession Program. Proposers must be capable of financing, installing, operating and maintaining the vending machines at LPIA.

A detailed Request for Proposal Document for the above is available for distribution to qualified and interested parties via email by contacting Mr. Oris Bowleg, Supervisor, Commercial Development at LPIARFP@nas.bs.

The Pre-Submission Meeting and Site Tour for interested proposers will be held on Thursday, October 13, 2022 at 11:00 a.m. EST.

Submissions in response to this RFP are to be received no later than 3:00 p.m. EST on Friday, November 11, 2022.

Download RFP:
